footer.tagline: Smart digital solutions for hotels and apartments. Automate check-in, integrate smart locks, and manage your property with a fully connected PMS ecosystem.

hero.subtitle: Automate check-in, integrate smart locks, and manage your property with a fully connected PMS ecosystem.

services.heading: Everything You Need to Go Digital
services.subheading: Streamline operations, delight guests, and reduce costs with our comprehensive hospitality solutions.
services.digitalCheckInDesc: Allow guests to check in and check out without the front desk.
services.smartLockDesc: Connect smart locks directly with your Property Management System.
services.kioskDesc: Install a self-service kiosk for automated check-in at the property.
services.mobileKeyDesc: Secure smartphone-based room access using encrypted keys that work seamlessly with your smart lock.
mobileKeyFeatures: Guest-friendly app for check-in and check-out
services.completePmsDesc: Automate your entire hospitality operation with smart locks, digital check-ins, card check-ins, and seamless PMS integrations—all from one platform.

howItWorks.heading: Four Steps to Full Automation
howItWorks.subheading: A fully automated guest experience from booking to check-out.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Through any booking channel — OTAs, direct website, phone, or directly at the self-service kiosk on-site.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Your Property Management System automatically syncs the booking and prepares everything.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Guest receives a digital key on their phone or checks in at the self-service kiosk.
howItWorks.step4Desc: Guest checks out seamlessly — no front desk interaction needed.

whoWeServe.heading: Designed for Every Type of Property
whoWeServe.subheading: From independent hotels to large hospitality groups, our automation solutions adapt to your property size and operational model.
whoWeServe.boutiqueDesc: Deliver seamless, contactless stays while maintaining a personalized guest experience. Ideal for properties focused on service quality and operational efficiency.
whoWeServe.vacationDesc: Automate guest access completely with 24/7 self-service check-ins. Manage multiple units from one dashboard with instant digital key generation.
whoWeServe.servicedDesc: Perfect for short and long stays. Enable digital check-in, mobile key access, and automated guest management for a seamless resident experience.
whoWeServe.hotelChainsDesc: Enterprise-grade hospitality automation that scales across all your properties. Centralized management, consistent guest experience, and powerful operational analytics.

digitalCheckin.title: Digital Check-In
digitalCheckin.description: Seamless mobile check-in with instant room access. Contactless, automated check-in in seconds so guests skip the front desk and go straight to their room.
digitalCheckin.processSubtext: A 5-step journey from booking confirmation to room access — fully automated.
digitalCheckin.step01Desc: Guest receives a check-in link by email 24 hours before arrival.
digitalCheckin.step02Desc: Guest uploads ID and confirms booking details.
digitalCheckin.step03Desc: Secure payment and room preference selection.
digitalCheckin.step04Desc: Mobile key is generated and sent to the guest automatically.
step04Features: Access only from check-in to check-out
digitalCheckin.step05Desc: Guest goes straight to the room, no front desk needed.
digitalCheckin.keyBenefitsSubtext: Digital check-in drives measurable improvements across every part of your operation.
digitalCheckin.ctaDescription: Set up digital check-in in days, not months. Our team handles the full integration with your existing PMS.
digitalCheckin.ctaDescriptionShort: Set up digital check-in in days, not months.

mobileKey.title: Mobile Key System
mobileKey.description: Secure smartphone-based room access for ultimate convenience. Replace physical key cards with encrypted mobile keys that work seamlessly with your existing smart lock infrastructure.
mobileKey.howItWorksSubtext: Seamless keyless entry in 5 simple steps.
mobileKey.seamlessSubtext: Simple, secure, and seamless mobile key access — right from your guest's pocket
mobileKey.keyGenerationDesc: After digital check-in, system generates unique encrypted mobile key
mobileKey.keyDeliveryDesc: Key sent via app push notification or SMS link to guest's phone
mobileKey.bluetoothPairingDesc: Guest's phone automatically pairs with door lock via Bluetooth
mobileKey.unlockAccessDesc: Guest approaches door, opens app, and taps to unlock
mobileKey.autoExpirationDesc: Key automatically expires at checkout time for security
mobileKey.featuresSubtext: Advanced security and convenience features that delight guests and simplify operations
mobileKey.bleSubtitle: Works without internet connection using BLE technology
mobileKey.securitySubtitle: Military-grade encryption and secure key transmission
mobileKey.timeBasedSubtitle: Automatic activation and expiration based on booking
mobileKey.beyondSubtext: Discover why leading hotels are replacing plastic key cards with secure, instant mobile access that guests love.
mobileKey.benefit1: No physical key cards to produce or replace
mobileKey.benefit5: Instant key revocation if phone lost
mobileKey.benefit6: Works with all major smartphone platforms
